Basic Technique of Waaagh! Discipline, all Ork Weirdboyz have this. Once per Round instead of using a Psychic Technique, may instead roll 1d100, if result is a psychic power, make Focus Power Test to manifest it, Powa' Burst Effects: 1-5: Anticlimatic Fizzle, nothing happens. 6-20: Frazzle. 21-30: Up an' at 'Em!. 31-40: Warpath. 41-50: Zzap. 51-60: Dis is Takin' Too Long!. 61-70: Smash da Gitz. 71-75: 'Ere we Go. 76-80: We'z Gotta Be Lucky. 81-85: Deff Wave. 86-90: Krump 'Em All. 91-95: 'Ead to 'Ead. 96-99: I'z Gonna Squig Ya! 100: Overload! Choose any other result, roll on 'Eadbang Table afterwards.
Weirdboy does not need to know the power in order to manifest it by this method. If Weirdboy has 3+ Psy Rating, may add or subtract their Willpower Bonus from the result of their roll.
